body: Can't say I'm surprised. Welcome to League of Legends. I'm starting to become extremely curious why a company whose revenue is over 600,000,000 in the year 2013 can't run a stable server. You're not getting any more of my money.

Hey Rocketf1sh!

We are actually not seeing any serverwide issues with players being unable to login to the client.  The particular error message that you received is usually due to a type of connection issue.  Let me help explain what is going on in the back-end:

Once you enter your credentials (your Username and Password), you need to connect to our Log-in Servers so that your information can be confirmed.  Once confirmed, League of Legends now needs to connects to our PvP.net servers (the client).  Once it establishes and maintains a stable connection, the client appears.  If PvP.net cannot maintain a solid and stable connection with your computer, then it will continue to try to connect and will eventually display this error message.

It can be incredibly hard to identify what is exactly blocking this connection, as it can range from Packet Loss, to Internet Explorer settings, to 3rd party security programs.  Because of this, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234161-Login-Issues

It has the most common resolutions to login issues and will allow us to narrow down the root cause to this issue.  If you have tried these steps and are still getting this error, make sure to [submit a new request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us.  We can investigate more in-depth and provide some additional solutions!  Just make sure to include the following information in your ticket:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
